about_the_game:
Start your space expedition with Swing by - a game that will test your skills and reflexes! Become a master of spaceship control as you race through endless space. Your task is simple but challenging: collect valuable gems and win prizes while skillfully maneuvering through space.



🎮 HOW TO PLAY
use gamepad, keyboard or mouse to rotate the ship around the planet and thrust forward to far reaches of unexplored space.
Click and hold anywhere on screen or click and hold key on keyboard or gamepad to spin around the planet. Release when you want to go foward!
Practice your reflexes as you spin around the planet and collect valuable rewards and prove you're the best.

🚀 2D and 3D Game view
Choose your gaming style between 2D and 3D perspectives. Experience the game in the way that suits you best.



💎 Gems and Ranks
Collect gems to unlock new levels and spaceships. Each level brings new challenges and exciting rewards for you to discover.


🚢 Various Spaceships
Unlock different spaceships to customize your gaming experience. Each ship has its own special characteristics.


🏆 Leaderboards
Compare your score to fellow space travelers around the universe


🌐Multiplayer
Join friends or challenge players around the world in exciting multiplayer battles. Show your skills and win galactic leadership!

Multiplayer is supported, only in local split screen mode up to 4 players can play together.
Note: Online multiplayer mode will be implemented in a future update.

Start your space expedition with Swing by - a game that will test your skills and reflexes! Become a master of spaceship control as you race through endless space. Your task is simple but challenging: collect valuable gems and win prizes while skillfully maneuvering through space.



🎮 HOW TO PLAY
use gamepad, keyboard or mouse to rotate the ship around the planet and thrust forward to far reaches of unexplored space.
Click and hold anywhere on screen or click and hold key on keyboard or gamepad to spin around the planet. Release when you want to go foward!
Practice your reflexes as you spin around the planet and collect valuable rewards and prove you're the best.

🚀 2D and 3D Game view
Choose your gaming style between 2D and 3D perspectives. Experience the game in the way that suits you best.



💎 Gems and Ranks

name: Swing By

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G6400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 680 or equivalent
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-3570K 3.4 GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Ask ChatGPT why are you single? It'll show you your low score in Swing By 💀😂
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
